name: Baziyo
description:
BAZIYO

In this game you are BAZIYO, a jelly alien who have to rescue his little brothers in this alien wolrd, using his teleport powers

HOW TO PLAY:

tap on the sides of the screen to move, tap twice to teleport.

Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/matheuspb95

CREDITS

This game was made with resources from UEA LUDUS (https://www.facebook.com/uealuduslab).
